titleInfo.title: Chiral behaviour and screening masses close to the chiral phase transition

mods.abstract: We investigate the temperature dependence of the chiral sector and of hadronic screening masses in quenched lattice QCD below the critical temperature.

bibliographicCitation.wels: Laermann, E.; Boyd, G.; Gupta, S.; Karsch, F.; Petersson, B.; Redlich, K. (1994): Chiral behaviour and screening masses close to the chiral phase transition Nuclear Physics, B: Proceedings Supplements,34: 292-294.
